item.title: A Refresher for Numpy-Numerical Computation on high gears
item.description: Numpy is a package used for scientific computing in python. Numpy’s core is implemented in C/C++ providing fast implementations of matrices operations. Numpy also utilizes the processors SIMD and other instructions to make implementation faster What is Numpy Numpy is a package used for scientific computing in python. Numpy’s core is implemented in C/C++ providing fast implementations of matrices operations. Numpy also utilizes the processors SIMD and other instructions to make implementation faster.
